pages.text: To get started forging, you will need to acquire several items. The first being a $(l:forging/tinkers_anvil)Tinker's Anvil$(), along with a $(l:items/tinkers_hammer)Hammer$(). Make sure that the tier of your anvil is at least as high as the tier of the item you want to create. Then you will need a method to heat up your items, some ingots to forge, and you can begin!
"What in tarnation do all these buttons do!" - Old Man McGucket

To work an item, you first need to heat it up. Different metals have different temperatures or colors at which they become workable. You can heat up items in a $(l:temperature/charcoal_forge)Charcoal Forge$() or the $(l:temperature/brick_forge)Brick Forge$(). However, be warned: Most items will melt if they get too hot, meaning you have to watch the temperature of your items carefully.
